parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper motor can cause the wipers to stop working or work intermittently, reducing visibility during rain or snow, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: Windshield wipers stop working or work intermittently
wipers do not turn off after turning on
wipers do not return to "home" position
washer fluid pumps do not work
wipers work for a short time and then stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The irregular activation of the ABS can cause the vehicle to take longer to stop, increasing the stopping distance, and potentially leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The ABS engages at low speeds
causing the brake pedal to pulsate or vibrate
and the vehicle to slow down erratically or not slow down at all
even when the brake pedal is pressed firmly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the power steering system can cause loss of control, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, especially during turns, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The steering feels stiff or hard
the steering wheel jerks or grabs
power steering locks up or fails intermittently
difficulty turning at slow speeds or when sitting still
